Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Eksluzivna ponuda: Autentična kuća u mjestu Podbrijest, smještena u dolini rijeke Neretve, predstavlja pravu oazu mira s nevjerojatnim pogledom na okolnu prirodu. Ukupne stambene površine 214 m², ova nekretnina se sastoji od dvije zasebne kuće, ukupno šest soba, tri kupaonice i jednog WC. Prva kuća je kamena, s prostranim dnevnim boravkom i blagovaonicom u prizemlju, te potpuno opremljenom kuhinjom i kupaonicom. Na katu se nalazi jedna dvokrevetna soba sa zahodom i dvije jednokrevetne sobe. Druga kuća je izrađena od modernih materijala. U prizemlju se nalazi dnevni boravak i blagovaonica, potpuno opremljena kuhinja i kupaonica. Na katu se nalazi jedna dvokrevetna soba s pomoćnim ležajem, dvije jednokrevetne sobe i dodatna kupaonica. Obe kuće su spojene unutarnjim prolazom. Posjed je okružen s tri natkrivene terase, idealne za uživanje u vanjskom prostoru. Uz kuću se nalazi i mali park s kaminom, bazen površine 27,5 m² s vanjskim tušem. Sunčani kolektori i plinski bojleri osiguravaju energetsku efikasnost. Cijela kuća ima centralno grijanje na pelete i videonadzor. Pripadaju joj i dvije ostave. Kuća se prodaje isključivo namještena, s svim potrebnim priključcima i aparatima. Ova nekretnina je savršeno mjesto za one koji traže mir i udobnost u prirodnom okruženju. Kupnjom ove nekretnine novi vlasnici dobivaju i brod Primorka s kabinom dužine 6,3 metra i nadkabinom, opremljen motorom Volvo-Torpedo snage 18/24 KS, savršen za uživanje u plovidbi rijekom Neretvom i istraživanje prekrasnog krajolika. ______________________________ Exclusive offer: An authentic house in the village of Podbrijest, located in the Neretva River Valley, offers a true oasis of peace with breathtaking views of the surrounding nature. With a total living area of 214 m², this property consists of two separate houses, with a total of six rooms, three bathrooms, and one WC. The first house is made of stone, featuring a spacious living room and dining area on the ground floor, along with a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. On the first floor, there is a double bedroom with a toilet and two single bedrooms. The second house is built with modern materials. It includes a living room and dining area on the ground floor, a fully equipped kitchen, and a bathroom. The first floor features one double bedroom with an extra bed, two single bedrooms, and an additional bathroom. Both houses are connected by an internal passage. The property is surrounded by three covered terraces, perfect for enjoying outdoor space. There is also a small park with a fireplace and a swimming pool measuring 27.5 m² with an outdoor shower. Solar collectors and gas boilers ensure energy efficiency. The entire house is equipped with central pellet heating and video surveillance and comes with two storage rooms. The house is sold fully furnished, with all necessary utilities and appliances included. This property is an ideal choice for those seeking peace and comfort in a natural setting. With the purchase of this property, the new owners will also receive a Primorka boat with a cabin length of 6.3 meters and an upper cabin, powered by a Volvo-Torpedo engine of 18/24 HP, perfect for enjoying sailing on the Neretva River and exploring the beautiful landscape. ______________________________ Kupac plaća proviziju / The Buyer pays the commission BROKER-Group RealEstate Croatia Obala kneza Branimira 1 21 000 Split, CROATIA tel.: +385 21 541 000 http://www.broker.hr
